name: chatroom
description: * Work in a fork of this repository * Work in a branch on your fork * Create a PR to your master from your working branch. * Ensure that your repository/branch is connected to travis-ci.com * Ensure that your repository/branch is connected to a dyno at heroku.com * Submit on canvas:   * a question and observation   * how long you spent   * link to your pull request   * link to your build at travis-ci URL
